Description.Content: Provides support for layout animation controllers; animation controllers is used to animated a layout's, or a view group's, children.
A layout animation controller used to animated a layout's, or a view group's, children.
Defines the XML namespace, which must be 'http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android'.
Animation to use on each child.
The order in which the animations will be started.
Animations are started in the natural order.
Animations are started in the reverse order.
Animations are started randomly.
Fraction of the animation duration used to delay the beginning of the animation of each child.
Interpolator used to interpolate the delay between the start of each animation.
A layout animation controller used to animated a grid layout's children
Defines the XML namespace, which must be 'http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android'.
Fraction of the animation duration used to delay the beginning of the animation of each column.
Direction of the animation in the grid. Must be one or more (separated by '|') of the constant values.
Animates columns from left to right.
Animates columns from right to left.
Animates columns from top to bottom.
Animates columns from bottom to top.

Priority of the rows and columns. When the priority is none, both rows and columns have the same priority. When the priority is column, the animations will be applied on the columns first. The same goes for rows.
Rows and columns are animated at the same time.
Columns are animated first.
Rows are animated first.
Fraction of the animation duration used to delay the beginning of the animation of each row.
